title: Boundaries and the measurement of plot areas of the DRP Area shall be declared by the competent authority after actual measurement of plot area on site and the same shall be adopted for planning purpose for calculation of density and floor space index
clause_text: Boundaries and the measurement of plot areas of the DRP Area shall be declared by the competent authority after actual measurement of plot area on site and the same shall be adopted for planning purpose for calculation of density and floor space index.
